statements: UPDATE public_meetings_and_hearings SET meeting_description = 'Board meeting' WHERE meeting_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE public_meetings_and_hearings SET meeting_date = '2022-09-15 10:00:00', meeting_location = 'City Hall' WHERE meeting_id = '3e2cc1e0-5d5d-4ad6-83e8-8fab2e66d14c';
UPDATE public_meetings SET meeting_location = 'Conference Room A' WHERE meeting_id = 1;
UPDATE hearings SET recording_url = 'https://example.com/recording' , hearing_location = 'Courtroom 1' WHERE hearing_id = 3;
UPDATE public_meetings SET meeting_location = 'Conference Room 1', notes = 'Updated meeting location' WHERE meeting_id = 123;
UPDATE hearings SET attendees = array['John Doe', 'Jane Smith'], recording_url = 'http://example.com/recording' WHERE hearing_id = 456;
UPDATE meetings SET meeting_description = 'Team Building Activities' WHERE meeting_id = 1;
UPDATE attendees SET attendee_email = 'john.doe@example.com', attendee_phone = '123-456-7890' WHERE attendee_id = 1;

UPDATE public_meetings SET meeting_title = 'Team Meeting' WHERE meeting_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE public_meetings SET meeting_description = 'Updated description' WHERE meeting_id = 1;
